abstract: Click the sketch to see this outfit’s journey from the page to the stage.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Greg Kessler captures the back story behind some of the alluring pieces from this year’s Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show, showing their trajectory from the original sketch to a fully realized look. Just begin clicking on the sketch above to transform it into the naughty-but-nice ensemble Alessandra Ambrosio wore on the runway. The show airs tonight on CBS.

headline.main: Square Roots | The Making of a Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show Look
